So you are the new hire? A friend of Christopher's?

sequence.msg: Here's a free piece of advice, new hire: don't get in my way. I'm rising through the ranks of this company faster than a SpaceX rocket. Your friend Christopher would do well to do the same. Now get back to work.
Whatever. Just know that I'm the top dog around here and Delores' right-hand man. Stick with me and I'll take you to the top. Now get back to work.
